Name: Verify Successful Facebook Login at Home Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and log in. Click on the 'Continue with Facebook' button and verify that the home page is displayed.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on h6 object > navigate to Page signin
step 4: At Page signin, click on button continue with facebook > navigate to Page home
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page home

Name: Verify Product Page after Selecting Plant from Shop
Description: Navigate to the home page, log in, and proceed to the shop page. Select a plant and verify that the product page is displayed.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink plant now > navigate to Page shop
step 4: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page product
